vote.title: Authorize acquisition from Ferris 45 Realty LLC., of a tract of land containing approximately 5.61 acres located on Blanco Drive near its intersection with Logistics Drive for the Cedardale Elevated Water Storage Tank Project - Not to exceed $787,000.00 ($780,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $7,000.00) - Financing: Water Construction Fund
